data.text: @CityNewsVAN I notice the article refuses to point out that most of these are from long term care… 🤦‍♂️ Come on people, this is year 3 of the pandemic. Include the science or stop talking about it. 💁‍♂️
@djian_f @CityNewsVAN Exactly . Because they’re in the panic porn business. CBC no better than the commercial outlets in that regard

@CityNewsVAN Why are you leading with that headline without more information? Due to covid or just happen to have covid? There is a distinction & without the full facts this could be a purely inflammatory stat. Why not lead with the reduction of people in the hospital? Cause it doesn’t sell?
